title: Episode 54 - Jim Serpico
itunes:title: Episode 54 - Jim Serpico
description: It’s time to break bread with Jim Serpico, show biz big wig and founder of Side Hustle Bread! Robert Kelly stops by for a Quick Bite after I finally track him down!
